phrases: love this book a lot, but...
love this book a lot, but...
Let me have it for a second...
Let me have it for a second...
If we do this, they will both find bliss and have a happy ending, right?
If we do this, they will both find bliss and have a happy ending, right?
It is been ages since I have had that dream.
The dream about when she and I met...
If I am going to dream about it, at least let me see the whole thing!
Well, it is no surprise that I had that dream.
Not after what happened the day before yesterday.
After all is said and done, Onodera is not the girl I made the promise to.
but now she totally thinks that Kirisaki and I are going out.
Why is this happening to me?
Anyway, today I am going to talk to Onodera and clear up this misunderstanding.
Even if it was ten years ago, and you were just kids...
Maybe it is still important to her.
I wonder if she is still holding onto the key after all these years.
Hey, bean sprout across the street!
Well, after our date the day before yesterday...
Any comments about your first date?
When are you going on your next date?
They bombarded me with questions about it!
I cannot even relax in my own home now!
The only place where we can let our guard down is at school, I guess.
How long does this have to go on?
Did they really mean all three years?
The biggest thorn in our sides is Four-Eyes,
seeing as he is the only one who is not buying it at all.
I have not seen him at all since this morning.
If, by any chance, you blow our cover at school, I am so going to make you regret it!
You do not have to remind me.
Make sure you have a word with her, too!
If she blabs about the day before yesterday, we are screwed!
Onodera's not the kind of person who would tell others
There is something I wanted to talk to you about.
Listen, about the day before yesterday...
Look, it is Ichijou and Kirisaki-san!
We have been waiting for you!
Rumor has it that you two are going out now!
We wish you everlasting happiness together!
What the hell are you talking about?
Hey, do not play dumb with me, Raku.
I have already got the scoop on you!
Itano and Shirogasaki witnessed you two on a date in the city on Saturday!
I never dreamed that you would get a girlfriend before me!
Why on earth would you take this unappealing tool as your boyfriend?
Must be nice to be young.
Are not you glad you are sitting next to each other?
Hold up a second, you guys!
This is all a huge misunderstanding, all right?
There are lots of good reasons
Now that my misgivings about their relationship have been confirmed,
I have got to find a way to trip up that little punk!
I swear I will deliver you from his malevolent hands!
What do you mean by good reasons?
Do not tell me you two are not actually dating.
You guys just did not get it!
We are not just any couple.
We are a couple that is totally hot for each other!
Jeez, do not give us a heart attack like that!
Come to think of it, I never finished what I was saying.
You guys just click like you are made for each other!
Why does this keep happening to us?
What is going to become of my high school life?
How long are you going to mope?
I am the one who is ready to wallow in depression!
Thanks to Four-Eyes staking us out during both lunch and our break time,
I never did get a chance to talk to Onodera.
All right, I have things to do,
Onodera's going to think I am taken all the way till graduation and I will never get a chance to tell her!
I will try talking to her again!
So I say, but I never have the chance...
Are you about to leave, Ichijou-kun?
Yes, my committee meeting just ended.
Sounds like a lot of work.
If I do not do it now, I may never get another chance to clear up this misunderstanding!
Onodera, could you listen to what I have to say?
So you two are not actually boyfriend and girlfriend.
But why are you only telling me?
Because you are the one person that I did not want getting the wrong idea?
Because I did not want you to think about me that way?
Hey, that is the same as telling her I am in love with her!
If I am confessing either way, I do not want it to be half-assed!
And besides, I am not mentally prepared for that yet!
W-Well, the truth is, I have been thinking that the gorilla and I are not the best match.
I am wondering myself how we ended up together.
You should not say things like that!
It is obvious that Kirisaki-san saw something that she liked in you, do not you think?
No, no, no, that is impossible!
Besides, there is nothing that great about me...
I am so thrilled that Onodera would praise me!
Kirisaki-san still has some trouble with Japanese,
and you have been secretly taking notes for her.
And like how you do not have it in you to ignore an abandoned animal,
or how you spend hours helping elderly women you do not even know look for things.
When your friends forget their homework,
you lie and say that you have forgotten yours too,
or when your friends are about to get busted by a teacher,
you stick with them so they do not have to get yelled at by themselves.
I told you there was plenty.
Onodera noticed me doing all those things.
No, those are just little things.
Kirisaki would not fall for me over that.
I think I can understand why Kirisaki-san fell in love with you, Ichijou-kun.
It does not seem to be a house key.
Th-This is... the key... to my house
I mistook it for my house key!
It is the key to an old bookcase in my house.
And instead of my house key
Oh my goodness, I am so embarrassed!
What in the world am I doing?
It is not what you think!
I have known her since middle school,
but I have never seen Onodera act like that before.
My heart was about to pop out of my chest!
She said herself that it was a different key, so it is probably true.
Besides, I learned that Onodera was not the girl I made the promise to not too long ago.
What am I doing, getting my hopes up?
But was that really the key to a bookcase?
I forgot to explain to her what is going on between Kirisaki and me again.
I will just give it another shot tomorrow.
I am sure I will get another chance.
You two do not waste time, huh?
This humiliation is too much to handle after all.
Well, it is only been a day.
Cannot expect these guys to lose interest so soon.
I really have to hand it to those two.
Okay, then we will invite you next time.
Y-Yeah, I will make it next time.
What is with all the fidgeting?
How did it come to this?
At the very least, we have to do something about Four Eyes.
Once he is in that mode, Claude will not listen to a word you say to him.
By the way, I guess I should let you know.
Apparently Claude will not be sticking around after school today.
Some kind of deal's going down, or something.
How long do I have to put up with this?
If you have a close friend who can keep a secret, you could probably tell them.
Even if it is just one person,
if there is someone who knows what you are going through,
I am sure that would take a load off your chest too.
In that case, why do not you just go right ahead?
What is that supposed to mean?
Why do not you shut up?
I have things to do after school, so you can just head home without me!
What is gotten into her now?
It is about Kirisaki-san, I bet.
These creatures called girls are as delicate as candy!
How soft are those lips of hers?
We have not done that yet!
I am your best friend, right?
It is not quite clear to me, but you told her she should confide in a friend about her secret.
I have absolutely no clue which part made her lose it.
Well, it could be that she was just in a bad mood, but...
If you ask me, it was her way of saying,
If I had any friends I could confide in, then I would!
Do not you think that is what it boils down to?
She does not have any friends?
You are her boyfriend, are not you?
But I have seen her talking with the other girls like she was having a blast.
but I have never seen Kirisaki acting as close with others as she does with you.
She was just here a minute ago, see.
Apparently there was no committee meeting today.
This was supposed to be my big chance!
Oh, man, what should I do now?
Kirisaki told me to go home, so maybe I should...
But I have never seen Kirisaki acting as close with others as she does with you.
I cannot help but worry about her when you feed me a line like that!
So I talked to her this morning again, but...
I just cannot shake the feeling that she is putting up a wall.
It is hard enough, trying to talk to the new girl who is both blonde and beautiful...
But she seems totally different when she is with Ichijou-kun.
Behind that pretty face, she might actually hate us.
I have spent a whole lot of time with her,
but I have been so preoccupied with being her fake boyfriend that
as far as her personal life was concerned,
I never even bothered to notice what was going on.
Seriously, this Chinese/Japanese pronunciation thing is a total mystery.
Iwashita-san is the girl with the ponytail.
She is on the tennis team.
Active, cheerful, and talks to me a lot.
She might be interested if I talk about sports.
Suzuki-san is the brunette in the Gardening Club.
She is easygoing and sweet, and likes cafe lattes.
Next time, I am going to start up a conversation for sure!
How long have you been there?
I do not know, I just...
Well, what am I supposed to do?
There is no other way, since I am still not familiar with everybody yet.
I have no idea how to approach them, or how to make friends.
You know how Claude is, do not you?
He is been watching over me since I was little,
but as you have already seen, he is overprotective.
Even when I was going to school, it had to be under escort.
Whenever I was out, he would be skulking around, packing a gun!
Before I knew it, he started checking out who I was hanging with.
You have no idea how hard he made it for me to make friends!
The truth is, I wanted to make friends like any normal girl and lead a peaceful life.
I thought that if I came to Japan,
no one would know that I was the daughter of a gang boss, and I would finally get a real shot at it.
But it is not working out for me, after all.
Why am I telling this to you of all people?!
Seriously, this is one messed-up story.
I guess if you are brought up in the same environment,
you start to think like each other, too, huh?
I used to have a notebook like yours too.
My dad's in the yakuza, you know.
So since I was a little kid,
every time I changed schools, people would say all kinds of things about me.
I made a notebook to help me overcome it.
Iwashita's a good kid, you know?
If you bring up sports in front of her, she gets totally fired up.
Suzuki's a good student, so you should ask her if you do not get something.
I bet you would get along really well with Moriya.
I am pretty sure she is been dying to talk to you.
I know pretty much everything about our class from all my past experiences.
Because I have made so many notebooks.
So I would be happy to help you out.
I may not like you, but that does not mean I do not get how you feel.
If you are going to insist like that, then I think I might as well let you help me.
You really have no clue how to act cute, do you?
Why should I act all cute as if I were your real girlfriend?
When all is said and done, we are just actors!
You do not have to tell me!
C'mon, show me your notes for a bit.
Why do I have to show you?
I will check them for you!
Why is my entry nothing but insults?
Do not read a young girl's notes without permission!
C'mon, it would not kill you to say something good about me!
Onodera-san is this type of person
Onodera-san is this type of person
Onodera must be on her way.
This happens every time right before she shows up.
I dropped by to give you a hand!
So they are letting you out today?
Your feelings for them really are not mutual, huh?
